creator: nicolagf@milwaukee.k12.wi.us
text:
I am using apache as a proxy server in fornt of tomcat.
It works fine.  I add mod_ssl to the picture and I get 
[Fri Sep 30 14:24:05 2005] [notice] child pid 5112 exit signal Segmentation
fault (11)
frequently.
I have seen cahnges in :
ssl_engine_io.c
sendrecv.c
proxy_http.c
Either they do not apply or do not work.
Since this is my first time,
What do yo uneed from me to figure this out?

Grab a backtrace using the instructions here:
http://httpd.apache.org/dev/debugging.html#crashes
creator: slive@apache.org

text:
Your httpd configuration, especially the modules loaded and the proxy and ssl
configuration would also be helpful.
creator: rpluem@apache.org
